pages.title: Millstone
pages.text: The <item>Millstone/$ is a simple <thing>$(l:intro/rotary)rotary powered/$ grinder. It can double ores, produce gravel and gunpowder, and improve bonemeal yields, among other things.$(br2)The <item>millstone/$ connects to an axle/gear on the top, and works faster at higher <thing>$(l:intro/rotary)speeds/$- capping out at 5rad/s.
For ore tripling, a heavier duty version called a <item>$(l:rotary/stamp)stamp mill/$ is needed.
